SS.description: The social security information in an array format.

MName.description: The middle name of the person

LName.description: The last name of the person

BirthDay.description: the birth day of the person

BirthMonth.description: The birth month of the person

BirthYear.description: the birth year of the person

DMV.description: The DMV information in an array format.

Fname.description: The first name of the person

MName.description: The middle name of the person

LName.description: The last name of the person

BirthDay.description: the birth day of the person

BirthMonth.description: The birth month of the person

BirthYear.description: the birth year of the person

LicenseNumber.description: The driver license number of the person

SD.description: The State Department in an array format.

Fname.description: The first name of the person

MName.description: The middle name of the person

LName.description: The last name of the person

BirthDay.description: the birth day of the person

BirthMonth.description: The birth month of the person

BirthYear.description: the birth year of the person
